Products.IntelliDateTime
========================

Field and Widget using ``bda.intellidatetime`` converter functions for date
and time input.

Target:
=======

  * Plone 2.5+, 3.x

Requires:
=========

  * bda.intellidatetime
  * plone of course
  * archetypes, sadly
